entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 5 except minus 10 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 5 except minus 10 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023
